revised_title: The Lymphatic Vessels and Their Role in the Body
tldr: The author, Louis de Bills, discusses the function and role of the lymphatic vessels in the body. He explains that these vessels carry a nutritious juice to all parts of the body and play a role in fermenting the blood. He also addresses the role of other vessels, such as the ductus virsungianus and the ductus salivales, in providing nutrients and fermenting substances to the body.
